name: fullstack-todo-app
description: A full-stack Todo application built with React.js and ASP.NET Core

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend/TodoApi && dotnet restore
scripts.clean: cd backend/TodoApi && dotnet clean && cd ../../frontend && npm run clean || true
scripts.test: cd backend/TodoApi && dotnet test && cd ../../frontend && npm test
scripts.format: cd frontend && npm run format || true

author: Todo App Developer
